H0.text: Which Gilbert and Sullivan operetta is sub titled 'Bunthornes's Bride'. H.M.S. Pinafore

H1.text: Which Gilbert and Sullivan operetta is sub titled 'Bunthornes's Bride'. The Pirates of Penzance

H2.text: Which Gilbert and Sullivan operetta is sub titled 'Bunthornes's Bride'. The Gondoliers

H3.text: Which Gilbert and Sullivan operetta is sub titled 'Bunthornes's Bride'. PATIENCE

A4.text: Patience; or, Bunthorne's Bride, is a comic opera in two acts with music by Arthur Sullivan and libretto by W. S. Gilbert.

A5.text: Patience moved to the 1,292-seat Savoy Theatre on 10 October 1881.
